name: Dérive, Movement 4 [Vale of Memory] Shift
description: Size: 3000x1706, 300 DPI, 7.4MB Year: 2014  Dérive, Movement 4 [Vale of Memory] Shift is part of a collection of moments pulled from The Cemetery Tapes.  The Cemetery Tapes are a collection of glitch videos created by the artist between 2012 and 2016. Utilizing a bespoke analog system, Parsons mixed video recordings, stills, and sketches documenting her movements through various Los Angeles cemeteries. The Shift series focuses on the moments between the major aesthetic changes of the video.
